articles.author: Press Association
articles.title: Spain see off heroic Switzerland on penalties to make semi-finals of European Championships - The42
articles.description: Luis Enrique’s side squeezed through after a 1-1 draw at the end of extra time.
articles.content:
Spain 1 
Switzerland 1 
Spain win 3-1 on penalties
SPAIN SQUEEZED THROUGH a penalty shootout to reach the semi-finals of Euro 2020 after goalkeeper Yann Sommers heroics for 10-man Switzerland prov… [+4184 chars]

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Spain beats Switzerland in penalty shootout to advance to Euro semifinals - Sportsnet.ca
articles.description: Unai Simon made two saves and Mikel Oyarzabal scored the decisive penalty to give Spain a spot in the European Championship semifinals by beating Switzerland 3-1 in the shootout after a 1-1 draw.
articles.content:
ST. PETERSBURG, Russia — Spain’s dreadful record from the penalty spot didn’t stop the team from reaching the European Championship semifinals.
